items.sentence: I sure never thought Tom would do something like that.
I\'m afraid I can\'t make myself understood in French.
That must\'ve happened while Tom and I were in Boston.
Your suggestion that we should help Tom is a good one.
Tom certainly let me know what he thought of my ideas.
You won\'t get another chance to do that anytime soon.
She has made up her mind to go to the States to study.
She has started to get a few wrinkles around her eyes.
I was surprised to see Tom\'s car in Mary\'s driveway.
Tom was sentenced to three weeks of community service.
Tom was the one who recommended this restaurant to me.
Tom was the one who suggested that I go out with Mary.
The last thing I want to do now is clean the bathroom.
Stop teasing Mary. Can\'t you see she\'s going to cry?
Tom didn\'t know who Mary wanted to go to Boston with.
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to Australia with Mary?
Didn\'t you know that Tom passed away three years ago?
The only place Tom hadn\'t looked was in the basement.
When did Tom and Mary start going out with each other?
When was the last time you did that with your friends?
I knew that Tom wouldn\'t be able to get into the bar.
I knew you wouldn\'t like the kind of music Tom plays.
Tom manages to find time for almost anything but work.
Unfortunately, Tom doesn\'t have a say in this matter.
Tom doesn\'t know what part of Australia Mary is from.
I\'ve already told Tom how much the tickets will cost.
You might want to childproof those electrical sockets.
If you\'re going to wait for Tom, I\'ll wait with you.
Tom said that he didn\'t know Mary could speak French.
Tom definitely doesn\'t want to take advice from Mary.
I told Tom he shouldn\'t go out after dark by himself.
Tom needed someone he could discuss his problems with.
I hope that we can avoid these mistakes in the future.
I wasn\'t the one who sang at Tom and Mary\'s wedding.
Tom can be a bit of a stickler when it comes to rules.
Do you have anyone on your staff who can speak French?
Do you really think Tom can convince Mary to help him?
Do you remember the first time we spoke to each other?
According to this map, there used to be a church here.
I\'m sure Tom will lend you as much money as you need.
I\'ve tried calling Tom all day, but the line is busy.
Would you tell Tom why you don\'t want him to do that?
Tom and I used to play together when we were children.
Tom asked Mary to go to Boston with John next weekend.
Tom wanted me to tell you he needs to borrow your car.
Why don\'t you come in for a cup of coffee and a chat?
Why don\'t you do something constructive for a change?
Why don\'t you stay here for a couple of days with us?
How did you come up with the idea for this exhibition?
Are our kids doing what they\'re supposed to be doing?
